p: Forty-four ten-week-old male golden hamsters ( Mesocricetus auratus, outbread strain Han:AURA) purchased from a commercial source (Centre d’Elevage René Janvier, Le Genest-Saint-Isle, France) were used for this study. The animals, housed in micro-filter cages at animal biosafety level 2 facilities, were kept and handled by a veterinarian.
